channel.title: Npc spawning
channel.description: ok i am having some probs spawning when i try to enter a new spawn it says it wont work can someone show me the correct format for spawning and please no flaming

item.title: Npc spawning
item.dc:creator: @sananya sananya
item.description:
@sananya wrote:

Okay bud. what you want to do is go into ur npc file. and enter something like this… except with what ever npc id and what ever coords that u want to spawn

(since tab dont work… ur gonna have to bare with me if theres any spacing errors)

spawn = 19 3207 3435 0 3208 3436 3206 3434 1 White Knight

okay so:

spawn = 19 (telling it to spawn the 19th npc id)
3207 3435 (telling it what coords to spawn it at)
0 (height… usually stays at 0 lol)
3208 3436 3206 3434 ( these are the movement ranges, the first two, i do +1 coord, the second 2 i do -1 coord,usually makse a good movement)
1 (this is the walktype… 0 makes the npc stay where its at even if u have movement cords, 1 makes im walk)
white knight (this is just an organization type of thing, its telling u when u look back into the file, what u had spawned with this code lol)

i hope this helps you.

Read full topic
